snippet.title: Candy Mountain Massacre 2 (PC) - Full 1080p60 Game Walkthrough - No Commentary
snippet.description:
The second Candy Mountain Massacre game! Also known as "Candy Mountain Massacre Part 2".

If you enjoyed watching this video, please leave a like and subscribe! I would very much appreciate it!

I found this and its prequel and sequel on BlueMaxima's Flashpoint. Might be nostalgic for some people!

Candy Mountain Massacre Games (PC) playlist:  https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLYwqV0N4djf9H_AvFo1_4m6BnbrCpDfvG

---Also on my channel---
Flash Games playlist: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLYwqV0N4djf-GyUGcG5jQQj7bBDdHC7Rh
Flash Games (Nickelodeon, Fox Kids, Jetix, Disney XD, Cartoon Network) playlist: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLYwqV0N4djf_0u30nZwG9Xt9CX0SuPRGR

Story: Candy Mountain - a happy land of jolly leprechauns and dancing cupcakes. Until a mystery plague turned them into murdering lunatics. 

You play Candy, an exterminator. Stop looking at your own butt.

You've done a good job clearing the first half of the kingdom (Candy Mountain Massacre Part 1). Now comes the hard part. Make your way up to the mountains, infiltrate the castle, and take out the Queen. She is the main carrier. And a giant cake. Watch out. She's going to throw everything she has at you. Nobody is reading this. Fjdkgdkfj g hgsgjdf gljg gh.

Release Dates - Before 2013
Genre - First-Person Shooter
Platforms - Shockwave / Flash / Browser
Developer - Mockworld.com
Publisher - Adult Swim

My Xbox gamertag: TGG Yari
My PlayStation gamertag: ToughGamingGuyYT
My Steam: toughgamingguy2

Wanna see more of my fantastic walkthroughs? Give it a go: https://www.youtube.com/user/ToughGamingGuy/playlists
